name: CHARITHA (Cherry)
tagline: You are the melody in ordinary moments, the sparkle in quiet skies.
intro: Today is for you—your laughter, your courage, your gentle heart. May every wish find its way to you.
footer: May this day be your most valuable memory.

quotes.text: May your heart always find reasons to dance, and your days be stitched with light.
quotes.author: For CHARITHA

quotes.text: You don’t just brighten rooms—you turn them into home.
quotes.author: With Respect

quotes.text: In the story of my life, your name is the chapter I reread.
quotes.author: Always

quotes.text: Every sunrise is a promise; today it promised you.
quotes.author: January 05

quotes.text: You are the quiet miracle that makes ordinary days extraordinary.
quotes.author: Cherry

quotes.text: If joy had a color, it would be the way you smile.
quotes.author: Forever
